7c9c3d74-58a8-4e2e-9ce5-459e8a7398dd.description: Earners of this badge complete an 18-month, intense international leadership development experience designed to facilitate personal leadership growth, foster academic career success, promote nurse faculty retention and satisfaction, and create high performing, supportive work environments in academe. Earners gain leadership skills; the ability to plan, implement, and lead team projects; and expand personal influence in the sponsoring institution, community, and the profession.
7c9c3d74-58a8-4e2e-9ce5-459e8a7398dd.name: Scholar Certificate of Completion - Nurse Faculty Leadership Academy (NFLA)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Currently employed full time in a teaching role with less than seven years of experience
Complete the application process
Must participate in two intensive, 4-day workshops with Leadership Mentor
Must regularly communicate with chosen Leadership Mentor and Faculty Advisor
Must conduct an in-depth leadership self-assessment, and based on findings, design an individualized leadership development plan
Must plan, design, and facilitate two site visits
Lead a team project that advances nursing education
Must participate in monthly Scholar community learning activities
Must present a professional poster and attend Sigma’s biennial convention

dd770f84-2b3f-4f8b-b454-9beb0ff87939.description: Earners of this badge complete a 6-week, virtual global advocacy experience designed for nurses. The learning offers the opportunity to refine advocacy efforts, learn more about Sigma's consultative status with the UN, and understand their role in furthering the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Each participant will have interactive experiences that can be used for healthcare and policy advocacy application, locally and globally. This academy is sponsored by Jhpiego.
dd770f84-2b3f-4f8b-b454-9beb0ff87939.name: Scholar Certificate of Completion - Virtual Mini Academy: Global Advocacy

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the application process
Participate in weekly learning activities
Complete a global advocacy action plan project presentation

c715d5f2-169e-427f-9de1-3a911a3f35c2.description: Earners of this badge mentor Scholars throughout an 18-month, intense international leadership development experience designed to facilitate personal leadership growth, foster academic career success, promote nurse faculty retention and satisfaction, and create high performing, supportive work environments in academe. Earners demonstrated leadership skills and experience; provided guidance to Scholar throughout the process; and committed to developing and sustaining a mentoring relationship.
c715d5f2-169e-427f-9de1-3a911a3f35c2.name: Mentor Certificate of Completion - Nurse Faculty Leadership Academy (NFLA)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Has a minimum of seven years of experience as nurse faculty and is doctorally prepared

e966950f-8c70-467c-97ef-11c0851cad6a.description: Earners of this badge complete a 10-week, interactive, mentored, online academy. It is designed to help healthcare professionals understand and practice diversity, equity, and inclusion through immersive video technology. This academy is designed to develop the motivation to change behaviors and hopefully nurse and patient outcomes. Sigma Nursing partnered with Shift to bring you this virtual and interactive mini academy.
e966950f-8c70-467c-97ef-11c0851cad6a.name: Scholar Certificate of Completion - Virtual Mini Academy: Health Equity Training

badge_template_activities.title: The academy is designed for any registered nurse, legally recognized to practice in their own country. Participants must be able to speak, read, and write English proficiently and have an interest in understanding and practicing diversity, equity, and inclusion.
Complete a pre-academy questionnaire (pre-test) - prior to the close of week 1.
Actively participate in 2 synchronous meetings.
Review and complete asynchronous activities.
Adhere to established deadlines.

be847f17-7ebc-4f1a-a2a6-e1a8f51d2d91.description: A nursing student nominated by their university to present their scholarly project as part of the Rising Star Research and Scholarship at Sigma's Creating Healthy Work Environments 2023.

d4cdc373-50c0-49c0-92e8-9ab4c373378a.description: Earners of this badge participated in curriculum development, presentation, and evaluation in an 18-month, intense international leadership development experience designed to facilitate leadership growth, foster academic career success, promote nurse faculty retention and satisfaction, and create high performing, supportive work environments in academe. Earners exemplify higher knowledge of nurse faculty leadership; guide triad through program objectives; and share experience with participants.
d4cdc373-50c0-49c0-92e8-9ab4c373378a.name: Faculty Certificate of Completion - Nurse Faculty Leadership Academy (NFLA)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Must have doctorate degree and experience teaching in a baccalaureate program
Must be current Sigma member
Demonstrated leadership in designing effective learning environments in classroom and clinical settings and established mentoring experience
Must participate in the academy’s online application review and selection process as a reviewer
Must participate in curriculum development, presentation, and evaluation; advises and mentors
Required participation in two virtual Faculty Meetings
Must be present at and participate in two intensive, 4-day workshops
Must attend two site visits for each assigned Scholar
Must attend Sigma’s biennial convention
Must serve as advisor to at least two Scholar/Leadership Mentor dyads and participate in triad calls at least once a month
Must attend all monthly faculty conference calls (1–1.5 hours each)

5f7273c8-7a14-4ea6-96e5-29ad85b80044.description: Badge earners have demonstrated higher level mentorship skills by supporting a scholar through a 12-month, international mentored leadership experience for new or aspiring educational administrators. Sponsored by Sigma and Chamberlain University, earners gain mentorship experience while sharing knowledge related to the administrator role in academe. Mentors support Scholars by initiating a plan to achieve administrative goals, sharing best practices, and helping them develop as an administrator.
5f7273c8-7a14-4ea6-96e5-29ad85b80044.name: Mentor Certificate of Completion - Emerging Educational Administrator Institute (EEAI)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Must have experience with lifelong learning, formal and informal mentorship of faculty and/or other professionals, and experience that will support the project's planning and implementation
Must complete the application process
Must participate in educational workshops and attend site visit
Must advise and support the development and completion of the leadership project and assist with dissemination of the project deliverables
Must attend Sigma's biennial convention

99b6d479-b0bd-492f-b87f-769e1621315d.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated advanced critical thinking and high level of knowledge through a 12-month, international mentored leadership experience as a new or aspiring educational administrator. Sponsored by Sigma and Chamberlain University, earners gain knowledge related to the administrator role in academe, including initiation of a personal plan to achieve administrative goals; best practices in action, decision-making, and communication; and development as an administrator.
99b6d479-b0bd-492f-b87f-769e1621315d.name: Scholar Certificate of Completion - Emerging Educational Administrator Institute (EEAI)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Must currently be (three years or less) or aspire to become an administrator in an academic institution
Must complete the application process
Must participate in educational workshops and execute site visit planning
Must develop and complete the leadership project and disseminate the project deliverables
Must attend Sigma's biennial convention

044fb151-581c-4dca-bd88-4a1e5a6ecf23.description: Earners of this Certificate of Completion have demonstrated advanced critical thinking and high level of knowledge through a 12-month, international mentored leadership experience designed for mid-career nursing faculty. 044fb151-581c-4dca-bd88-4a1e5a6ecf23.name: Certificate of Completion - Experienced Nurse Faculty Leadership Academy (ENFLA)

Must attend Sigma's biennial convention

a8356d74-8456-46e2-b62d-abff36e6aba5.description: Earners of this badge complete a 12-month, leadership development experience designed for nurses in the first five years of their academic appointment. The learning is designed to facilitate personal leadership growth, foster academic career success, promote nurse faculty retention and satisfaction, and create high performing, supportive work environments in academe. Badge earners are culturally sensitive leaders who demonstrate integrity and value diversity in the institution and profession.
a8356d74-8456-46e2-b62d-abff36e6aba5.name: Scholar Certificate of Completion - New Academic Leadership Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the application process
Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Currently employed full time in a teaching role and within the first five years of academic appointment
Participate in a 2 ½ day intensive event led by leaders and education experts from academe and clinical practice
Must participate in monthly learning activities
Lead a team project that advances nursing education
Must regularly communicate with chosen Mentor
Must conduct an in-depth leadership self-assessment

f2d21301-9c9c-4975-9b38-8fa82c81f26a.description: Earners of this badge participate in a 12-month leadership-driven, evidence-based curriculum that offers interactive opportunities for discussion, networking, and collaboration. Badge earners are nurse leaders at the forefront of nursing practice participating in a unique learning structure designed to prepare them to thrive in our rapidly changing healthcare environment.
f2d21301-9c9c-4975-9b38-8fa82c81f26a.name: Scholar Certificate of Completion - Nurse Leadership Academy for Practice

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the application process
Possess a baccalaureate degree in nursing (BSN) or higher nursing degree
Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Must participate in a 2 ½ day intensive event led by leaders and education experts from academe and clinical practice
Must conduct an in-depth leadership self-assessment
Implement and manage an interprofessional team project that results in process and cost efficiencies, increased patient care quality, or population health outcomes
Must regularly communicate with chosen Mentor
Must participate in monthly Scholar learning activities
Must present an oral presentation at Sigma's Nurse Leaders Virtual Summit

2b8c329e-11aa-4dd3-a37e-befe9ea4d1c9.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated advanced critical thinking and high level of knowledge through a 12-month, international mentored leadership experience as a new or aspiring educational administrator. Sponsored by Sigma and Chamberlain University, earners gain knowledge related to the administrator role in academe, including initiation of a personal plan to achieve administrative goals; best practices in action, decision-making and communication; and development as an administrator.
2b8c329e-11aa-4dd3-a37e-befe9ea4d1c9.name: Certificate of Completion - Emerging Educational Administrator Institute (EEAI)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Must currently be (three years or less) or aspire to become an administrator in an academic institution
Must complete the application process
Must participate in educational workshops and execute site visit planning
Must develop and complete the leadership project and disseminate the project deliverables
Must attend Sigma's biennial convention

fd1ada7d-6c82-4db0-a652-fa6274693401.description: Badge earners have demonstrated advanced experience in the role of nurse faculty, having participated in curriculum development, presentation, evaluation, and advising and mentoring dyads through a 12-month, international mentored leadership experience designed for mid-career nursing faculty. Sponsored by Sigma and Chamberlain University, earners exemplify leadership acumen and aid in the development and increase of Scholar's skillsets essential for success in an academic leadership role.
fd1ada7d-6c82-4db0-a652-fa6274693401.name: Faculty Certificate of Completion - Experienced Nurse Faculty Leadership Academy (ENFLA)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Holds a terminal degree and must be a current Sigma member
Must have at more than 10 years of full time employment in a teaching role
Oversees and approves the writing of the application; participates in the academy’s online application review and selection process as a reviewer
Participates in curriculum development, presentation, and evaluation; advises and mentors
Must advise and assist in development and completion of Scholar's leadership projects and dissemination of the project deliverables
Must serve as advisor to assigned Scholar/Mentor dyads and participate in triad calls at least once a month
Must participate in educational workshops and attend site visits for each assigned Scholar
Must participate in monthly Faculty planning calls
Must attend Sigma's biennial convention

138857a0-ba70-4efb-8312-ac77cb9debf1.description: Earners of this badge have written curriculum, planned workshops, presented, and executed a 12-month, international mentored leadership experience for new or aspiring educational administrators. Sponsored by Sigma and Chamberlain University, earners display higher knowledge of the administrator role in academe, including Scholar development of personal plans to achieve administrative goals; best practices in action, decision-making, and communication; and participant growth as administrators.
138857a0-ba70-4efb-8312-ac77cb9debf1.name: Faculty Certificate of Completion - Emerging Educational Administrator Institute (EEAI)

badge_template_activities.title: Must be legally recognized to practice nursing in their country
Holds a terminal degree and be a current Sigma member
Must currently be or have been an administrator in an academic institution for more than 10 years
Oversees and approves the writing of the application and participates in the academy’s online application review and selection process as a reviewer
Participates in curriculum development, presentation, and evaluation; advises and mentors
Must advise and assist in development and completion of Scholar's leadership projects and dissemination of the project deliverables
Must serve as advisor to assigned Scholar/Mentor dyads and participate in triad calls at least once a month
Must participate in educational workshops and attend site visits for each assigned Scholar
Must participate in monthly Faculty planning calls
Must attend Sigma's biennial convention
